title: M.U.M.P.S. have arrived
body: This just in: cases of M.U.M.P.S. have been reported at The Moxie. People in perfect health have been recorded entering the theater and coming out with a R.A.S.H.. If you don't know what I'm talking about, see here... or better yet, just ask for a M.U.M.P.S. R.A.S.H. next time you're in. They're AWESOME!
author: Dan

comments.author: Lor
comments.body:
I wish our local cinema gave me a MUMPS RASH...

I never thought I'd ever type that...

comments.author: Sean
comments.body: I've never been so excited to have mumps.

comments.author: Caleb
comments.body:
And if you bring a friend and buy their ticket you can get a double-dose of MUMPS on your RASH that night.

I think you need a rating system somehow tied in with the forums - using the same login names at least. People can rate the movies you show and you can have a special page showing your highest-rated movies and whatnot. And maybe your highest-rated movie of each year could have a special screening at the end of the year (or in November instead of the deep dark depths of December).

comments.author: erin
comments.body:
caleb has a SERIOUS problem with ranking and rating things. a serious problem. he ranks books. movies. poops. people. he has a notebook at home where keeps all his rankings. i snuck a peak at the people section once. dan... you have a c. nicole a b+. and me.... an a++. obviously.

(this is only is partly false.)

comments.author: Andy
comments.body:
I got a rash tonight.  Oh, and a R.A.S.H., too.

(drum fill)

comments.author: Caleb
comments.body: Erin...that was another Erin I know... :-P

comments.author: Mom
comments.body:
You're bathrooms look cleaner since they were cleaned by your Mom.  Everyone likes clean and clean smelling bathrooms, especially when both genders use them!

Don't forget to come have cake at my open house at the bank Friday (20th) from 9 to 3!Dana is bringing Ivy, I think.

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: It's true. My mom loves cleaning bathrooms.

comments.author: evilvet
comments.body: Since we're on the subject of multigender-friendly accomodations, here's hoping "Transamerica" will be visiting The Moxie.

comments.author: Laurali
comments.body:
I'll echo evilvet's wish for "Transamerica" to appear at the Moxie.

I can't wait to get my M.U.M.P.S. R.A.S.H.!

comments.author: Caleb
comments.body: Everyone should celebrate MLK Day by going to the Moxie and hearing Sarah Silverman trash-talk him!
